item.title: Our Vision
item.desc: To become, an engineering educational institution of international standing by striving continuously in pursuit of excellence in education, research, entrepreneurship and technology related services to the society

item.title: SOE-B.Tech. I Semester Classes Commence from 26 July, 2017
item.desc: B.Tech.regular classes for I Semester students of School of Engineering(SOE), Trikakkara Campus will Commence from 26 July, 2017. There will be an inauguration and induction programme on 26 July 2017 at 9:30 AM in the Auditorium of Seminar Complex.

item.title: Anti-Ragging Awareness Program 2017-18
item.desc: CUSAT with the help of District Legal Service Authority, Ernakulam conduct a drive of Anti-Ragging Awareness.

item.desc: B.Tech.regular classes for I Semester students of School of Engineering(SOE), Trikakkara Campus will Commence from 26 July, 2017. There will be an inauguration and induction programme on 26 July 2017 at 9:30 AM in the Auditorium of Seminar Complex.

item.title: Anti-Ragging Awareness Program 2017-18
item.desc: CUSAT with the help of District Legal Service Authority, Ernakulam conduct a drive of Anti-Ragging Awareness.
